channel.title: [RS2] Fight Caves AFK Trainer BETA 1.5 [SCAR 2.03]
channel.description:
My new Fight Caves attack trainer. This was going to be a private script for our friends to raise their attack with so they can use their whips, lol. There's alot more about this script on its download page, so check it out will ya?
Here's a small list of what it does: [b]Enter caves, fight monsters (AFK), when lose: re-enter caves, repeat, etc.. [/b]
Download the script here: [url=http://geocities.com/dizzycoders/scar/scripts/FCAFK.html]http://geocities.com/dizzycoders/scar/scripts/FCAFK.html[/url]
You can also view its reports made by the beta testers here: [url=http://geocities.com/dizzycoders/scar/scripts/reports/FCAFK.html]http://geocities.com/dizzycoders/scar/scripts/reports/FCAFK.html[/url]
The script is currently under constant updating, so check its download page often. ;)
Please report ANY bugs you find to this email: dizzycoders@yahoo.com Also if you need any help setting up the script.
Have fun cheating, ~Dizzy :)

item.title: [RS2] Fight Caves AFK Trainer BETA 1.5 [SCAR 2.03]
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

[quote=“petrock6, post:6, topic:47828”]Thanks for this script! However, it doesnt use SRL…Im not saying its bad, but thus makes it more detectable! Heck, i dont know SRL myself.

I hope all goes well!

~petrock[/quote]

Actually, it does use SRL now. I just haven’t released the SRL version yet. It moves alot smoother now and should be WAY less detectable. Plus, it now has anti-randoms.

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2] Fight Caves AFK Trainer BETA 1.5 [SCAR 2.03]
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

[quote=“ChArMz, post:4, topic:47828”]Use SRL’s Include, Get It @ Villu-reborn.com

SSI2 IS WAY WAY OUTDATED, CHECK OUT SRL

Just trying to help you out

~ChArMz[/quote]

I know, it’s just that SRL never seems to work properly for me. It’s mostly the text finding procedures, like ‘FindTextMulti’.

I guess I’ll test and see if SRL works good with the script.

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2] Fight Caves AFK Trainer BETA 1.5 [SCAR 2.03]
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

melol2:

Hmm. And what level is suggested to start using this script?

Atleast level 60+, any lower then it will be sort of training, but level 40 or lower then it’s not recommended. It also depends on what kind of armour you wear. If you want to last long in the caves, I suggest a combat level of 80-90 or higher and have Rune-Dragon OR Barrows armour equipped.

Read full topic
